name: rag-system
description: Modern question-answering system based on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with support for multiple LLM providers and vector databases.

scripts.postinstall: npm install --force --prefix backend && npm install --force --prefix frontend && npm install --force --prefix prisma-generator-nestjs-dto
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix prisma-generator-nestjs-dto
scripts.generate: npm run generate --prefix backend && npm run generate --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.generate:frontend: npm run generate --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
